titles: Aut Helmont, aut asinus: or, St. George untrust being a full answer to his Smart scourge.
author: G. S.
publisher: printed for R. Lowndes, at the White Lion in S. Pauls Churchyard,
notes: A reply to: Starkey, George.  A smart scourge for a silly sawcy fool.
Cropped and frayed at head with loss of most page numbers.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Starkey, George, 1627-1665. --  Smart scourge for a silly sawcy fool --  Early works to 1800.
